heading: Thematic maps.
general-note: Here are entered works on maps that depict a special topic or theme, and with geographic subdivision, works on maps that depict a topic in that place. Individual thematic maps and topical geographic atlases are entered under headings of the type [topic]--[place]--Maps or [place]--[topic]--Maps, e.g.. Agriculture--United States--Maps; Africa--Climate--Maps..
